long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This innovative new extension allows the user to immerse themselves in the amazing world of the fidget spinner. 

By alerting you when a new fidget spinner appears, and allowing you to remove it through a simple click, this extension keeps the user engaged and alert, allowing them to stay focused on their work.
